ValidationRule.description: This validation rule prevents anybody from changing the Bill Rates once the Assignment is set up - unless they are an admin in Salesforce or in the Standard User - Administrative profile.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(pse__Bill_Rate__c), NOT($Profile.Id = '00e30000000bvR3'), /*Profile: System Administrator*/ NOT($Profile.Id = '00e50000000hvYe'), /*Profile: Standard User - Administrative*/ NOT($User.Id ='00550000005YQdR') /*User: Kim Bespaly*/ )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please do not change the Bill Rate once it is set. Contact PS Ops (ps_ops@intapp.com) if you believe the bill rate needs to be changed.
